@SMLNTHNMCK toy fair? Take lots of pictures of cool shit!
@MattGarvey1981 okay maybe THAT Dick!
@MattGarvey1981 YOU'RE HIRED #NoDickPicsPlease
That being said. I wish I wasn't the only person running the store twitter Monday to Friday. I barely have any time for social media lately.
I love being busy and I love my team. So fucking solid!
Man, new comic delivery days are nuts. I'm pretty sure it was 9am about 20 minutes ago.
@MattGarvey1981 I need to get my script together FAST!!
@ckyhellion I don't know what it is about the orange but it stands out so much. There's crew necks and hoodies too. They're class!
@ckyhellion I needed to show the world!!

RIP first pair of skinny jeans of 2017. Another pair. Another hole ripped in the crotch. Another lost receipt.

@kierawaringx the way things are currently going its probably best to keep your expectations low. They managed Harley so poorly in SS!

@nellucnhoj I'm the same. Are we so spoiled as consumers that even a huge budget super hero movie doesn't get us excited? Are we broken?
@Cazlou1980 you're right. At least the have something going for them in that aspect. I still think star wars has the right idea!
Even that new Justice League image had me like 'eh it's alright'. No excitement.
I don't know what it is about the DCEU but after Batman Vs Superman and Suicide Squad, I don't think I'll ever be sold on another DC Movie.

Yeah OK we're doing GamerCon!

I'm wondering if it's worth exhibiting at GamerCon in March. We've got quite a bit of Gaming Merchandise in the shop. Could be cool!

I'm broken today. Woke up at 2pm. Went for lunch. Went back to bed until 10pm.
@Steoleary87 I reckon you wouldn't be lost at all. The new viewing order actually considers Rogue one as the first. It ties into A New Hope!
2017. Continue as you mean to go on. In woolshed having wings and beers.
@xTwoShoes WhatsApp me
I spent last night watching movies, eating crap and playing Battlefield with Alva. Glad we decided to stay in.
Happy New Year, Everyone!! Thankful for a solid year both professionally and personally. I plan on eating more burritos in 2017.
Anyone with NYE plans in Dublin, Hit me up.
